title: A Certified tractor
creator_credit: Robert Hesselschwerdt and Victoria. Dept. of Agriculture
brief_description: Shows the various methods of testing tractors by the Australian Tractor Testing Committee. Accurate measurement of belt and engine power, noise level at the driver’s ear and fuel consumption; pulling power; location of the centre of gravity; dismantling of engine and checking after 60 hours use; critical assessment of the general features.
